page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: RELIGION Most of the people in this area belong to the Church of England.The others were Catholic and attend church weekly.The people who belonged to the Church of England attended church monthly or on Saints' days (e.g Christmas).A few of the people were not members of any religious groups and only attend church once or twice a year. The churches attended were:St. Mary's Catholic church in Brewood or St. Chad's which is also in Brewood. Other churches were either in Shifnal or in Stafford. One typical man was not religious but in his past was a bellringer and went to church weekly. He now does not go to church but considers himself a true Christian. Most people did not attend church often but thought of themselves as true Christians like this man.
